text: APPLICATION TO INTERNAL GRANT FOR ACADEMIC ACTIVITY RGP Use Only SECTION II PROJECT PERSONNEL Name or position Faculty / Institution FRG-A410-06-01 Grant Period â€“ Application Date / / SECTION I: PROJECT SUMMARY Project Title Principal Investigator Proposed Start Date Proposed Duration Day Mo Yr (Days or weeks) Funding Source SU Internal Grant Total Budget YTL Jointly funded Funding Agency Amount Commitment Status - proposed/accepted etc. List of in-kind contributions (if any) Approximate value Contributing Institution List of non-funding project Partners if any Proposed Deliverables of Project Publications Seminar / workshop / conference Int.Paper presentation Other APPLICATION TO INTERNAL GRANT FOR ACADEMIC ACTIVITY SECTION III PHYSICAL RESOURCE USE III.A On-campus Type (Lab / Classroom / Auditorium / Office) Number of rooms Building III.B Off- campus Type (Lab / Classroom / Office) Location / Institution SECTION IV ACTIVITES INFORMATION Earlier in the year from SU related support this event received?
